attributes.title: This app shot my grandma

I, Garth Brooks, can personally attest that I saw THIS APP standing above my screaming grandmother with a gun. She is now in the hospital in critical condition. She is my best friend. Or was... If you love your grandma, im begging you, please, please donâ€™t download this app.
